CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, June 23, 1951, pg. 32, reads: "Pitt's Educators, Soldiers, Teachers, Chemists, Engineers - ...Right photo: Troy L. Stewart, Arthur Bivins Jr., Harry J. Addison, Henry L. Heins and Herman L. Clay. Bivins finished in business administration.  Addison was awarded his degree in engineering.  The others finished courses in [illegible] ...modern world, upset by international tensions, [ill.] ...of them to help straighten it out... All Pictures on This Page Were Taken for the Courier by Charles (Teenie) Harris."
TitMainTitle: University of Pittsburgh graduates, from left: Troy L. Stewart, Arthur Bivins Jr., Harry J. Addison, Henry L. Heins, and Herman L. Clay, posed in front of sphinx statue outside of Syria Mosque, Oakland
